titleStmt.title: Sir Robert Sherley, sent ambassadour in the name of the King of Persia, to Sigismond the Third, King of Poland and Swecia, and to other princes of Europe his royall entertainement into Cracovia, the chiefe citie of Poland, with his pretended comming into England : also, the honourable praises of the same Sir Robert Sherley, giuen vnto him in that kingdome, are here likewise inserted.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

titleStmt.title: Sir Robert Sherley, sent ambassadour in the name of the King of Persia, to Sigismond the Third, King of Poland and Swecia, and to other princes of Europe his royall entertainement into Cracovia, the chiefe citie of Poland, with his pretended comming into England : also, the honourable praises of the same Sir Robert Sherley, giuen vnto him in that kingdome, are here likewise inserted.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Windet, for Iohn Budge, and are to bee sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
